quick Q will unbiuntu support my wireless card?
ignore anyone saying "should." there is no way to make such an assessment accurately without knowing the card's chipset model and vendor.
who makes the the chipset on the card?
(hint, Linksys does nto make wireless chipsets)
what exact model is the card?
since it's Linksys and this is a laptop, is this a Cardbus or ExpressCard?
is this Linksys a Cardbus device? v7 of the card?
